events.message: I received the wrong item and I would like to request a refund for my order as soon as possible.
The case has been identified as related to a refund request based on the customer's message.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah J. for resolution regarding the refund request.
Hello, I’m Sarah from support. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you kindly share the order number and details about the item you received versus what you ordered?
My order number is 987654321. Instead of the jacket I ordered, I got a pair of shoes. I want a full refund.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately and provide a prepaid shipping label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund process starting right away and the prepaid label for return.
The refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please return the incorrect item at your earliest convenience.
We are checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed successfully and no further issues were reported, your case will now be closed.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey regarding your recent support experience to help us improve our services.
